code: import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';var initialState={value:{'gid':'','user_ids':[],'timestamp':'','name':''}};var gameSlice=createSlice({name:'activeGame',initialState:initialState,reducers:{setGame:function setGame(state,action){state.value=action.payload;},resetGame:function resetGame(state){state.value=initialState.value;}}});var _gameSlice$actions=gameSlice.actions,setGame=_gameSlice$actions.setGame,resetGame=_gameSlice$actions.resetGame;export{setGame,resetGame};export var selectGame=function selectGame(state){return state.activeGame.value;};export default gameSlice.reducer;
